channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+1958] Saddest Photo Evar [Pic]
[+1493] Mike Tyson’s Brutal Honesty (PIC)
item.description: When in search for some words of wisdom, few would expect them to come from Mike Tyson.

item.title: [+1461] Colbert's Nuclear Explosion
[+1090] 5 Super Neat Ways to Use a Hooker - The Oatmeal
item.description: Hookers are good for a lot more than just sexy adventure time.

item.title: [+1046] Republicans Support Strip Clubs On Ground Zero Sacred Ground
item.description: Apparently, the Family Values Party is not concerned with the strip clubs (like New York Dolls) that surround hallowed ground (after all, we all know that Hooters is a family restaurant and Fox News is not conservative day time porn), because nothing says Christian Values and Apple Pie like a strip club.

item.title: [+1020] 7 Scientific Reasons a Zombie Outbreak Would Fail (Quickly)
item.description: Realistically, the zombies would all be dead long before you even got a chance to fire up that chainsaw motorcycle you've been working on.

item.title: [+946] Desperate Pandora Employees Scramble To Find Song Man Likes
item.description: OAKLAND, CA—The headquarters of personalized online music provider Pandora remained in a state of chaos Thursday as frantic workers struggled to find a song that 32-year-old Boston subscriber Dave Lipton would enjoy.

item.title: [+860] Watch a Ton of Pigeons Being Trapped By a Catapulted Net
item.description: Cruel? Maybe! But a plague's a plague, I guess? And anyway if you don't think that resulting video is the craziest thing you've seen today, you are just totally in-coo-rrect. Via Gizmodo

item.title: [+777] Wasted Potential: The Cost Of Marijuana Prohibition [pic]
item.description: 850,000 arrests a year. $340 billion in lost tax revenue.$14 billion on the drug war. The real cost of keeping marijuanaillegal in America.

item.title: [+651] Firefly's Kaylee (Jewel Staite) talks about her 'dark side'
item.description: If you like Jewel Staite as Kaylee from Firefly and Serenity and Dr. Jennifer Keller from Stargate: Atlantis, you'll love the REAL Jewel Staite!

item.title: [+635] Amazing HD Fractal zoom
item.description: Two days to set up, and then six months to render. Be sure to watch in 720p HD. The final magnification of the Mandelbrot fractal is 6.066e+228 (2^760). Want some perspective? If you were actually traveling into the fractal, you would be moving faster than the speed of light. So chill out for a while, and stare into the eye of the universe.

item.title: [+621] Bought for $5.4 Billion, Sold for $36 Million
item.description: Lycos was acquired by Terra Networks, the internet arm of Spanish telecom giant Telefónica, for $5.4 billion in May 2000.

item.title: [+547] Computer Tools: Your At-Home IT Toolkit
item.description: It's been true since the dawn of the PC's creation: if you know anything about technology, you end up helping out everyone else. The IT pros at your office have their specialized tools to assist them. Here's a collection you can take with you, the home-based IT person handling tech support for family, friends, and friends of friends.

item.title: [+510] The First IMAX 3D Porn Movie Is Here (Yes, IMAX 3D Porn)
item.description: I can understand 3D porn movies at home, but IMAX 3D porn? Who wants to sit through two hours of explicit 60-foot tall 3D sex scenes, no matter how engrossing the plot could be? With other people around, I mean.

item.title: [+509] America ranks 11th in world's "best" countries
item.description: According to a new Newsweek list, the United States is not the worldbeater it was a decade ago. On economic fundamentals such as GDP growth, household consumption, industrial production, and trade, the U.S. was ahead on most metrics 10 years ago. Not today.

item.title: [+483] Glenn Beck's Rally Spurs Anger
item.description: Beck's "Restoring Honor" rally, with Sarah Palin among the scheduled speakers, will take place on the steps of the Lincoln Memorial, 47 years to the day after Martin Luther King Jr. delivered his famous "I Have a Dream" speech there. Civil rights leaders have denounced Beck's plans, questioning his motives for choosing the date and place.

item.title: [+475] Rolling Stone TRUE BLOOD cover is bloody as hell (nsfw pic)
[+468] The Secret Histories of Those @#$%ing Computer Symbols
item.description: They are road signs for your daily rituals-the instantly recognized symbols and icons you press, click, and ogle countless times a day when you interact with your computer. But how much do you know about their origins?

item.title: [+450] Google, Verizon warned not to "cable-ize" the Internet
item.description: Four prominent net neutrality supporters in Congress rail against the Google/Verizon "neutrality" proposal, saying that "no private interest should be permitted to carve up the Internet to suit its own purposes." Still, Congress has no plans to do anything about it.
